title: What is Unsupervised Learning in Machine Learning?
description: Unsupervised learning encompasses all types of machine learning where there is no known output, there is no teacher to instruct the learning algorithm. In this article, I’ll introduce you to unsupervised machine learning and its types.
description_lemmatized: unsupervised learning encompasses type machine learning known output teacher instruct learning algorithm article ill introduce unsupervised machine learning type
